import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils";const API_URL=`${BASE_URL}/notes`;// Get all notes
export const getNotes=async()=>await axios.get(API_URL);// Get note by ID
export const getNote=async id=>await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/${id}`);// Create new note
export const createNote=async note=>await axios.post(API_URL,note);// Update note
export const updateNote=async(id,note)=>await axios.put(`${BASE_URL}/${id}`,note);// Delete note
export const deleteNote=async id=>await axios.delete(`${BASE_URL}/${id}`);
